snippet.title: The Mice Guys - cute little city builder with mice! (Full Gameplay) for PC & Android
snippet.description:
FREE DOWNLOAD: https://zwizausch.itch.io/the-mice-guys



Create a flourishing little mouse colony, by managing mouse behaviour and crafting all buildings. If you do a mice... err nice job, they will build you a monument.


Solidarity is key!


Just experiment and watch what the mice do ;)


Made by

Timo Falcke - programming/animation
Sandro Heuberger - programming
Luca Langenberg - art/3d
Zwi Zausch - art/3d
